sentence: I need to go to the ______ to deposit this check.
sentence_translation: 我需要去银行存这张支票。

sentence: Engineers plan to ______ a new skyscraper in the city center.
sentence_translation: 工程师们计划在市中心建造一座新的摩天大楼。

sentence: She picked up her dry cleaning from the ______ this morning.
sentence_translation: 她今天早上从干洗店取回了她的干洗衣物。

sentence: The ancient bridge ______ the river for over 200 years.
sentence_translation: 这座古桥跨越这条河已有200多年了。

sentence: The trial will be held at the ______ next Monday.
sentence_translation: 审判将于下周一在法院大楼举行。

sentence: This highway will ______ the two towns more efficiently.
sentence_translation: 这条高速公路将更高效地连接这两个城镇。

sentence: We buy fresh vegetables and fruits at the ______ every weekend.
sentence_translation: 我们每周在超市购买新鲜的蔬菜和水果。

sentence: We visited the ______ ______ to see rare tropical plants.
sentence_translation: 我们参观了植物园，去看稀有的热带植物。

sentence: My laptop crashed, so I took it to the ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 我的笔记本电脑死机了，所以我把它送到了电脑维修店。

chinese: 机动车管理部门；车管所
sentence: You need to go to the ______ ______ ______ ______ to get a new driver’s license.
sentence_translation: 你需要去车管所办理新的驾照。

sentence: It’s dangerous to ______ across busy streets without looking.
sentence_translation: 不看路就乱穿繁忙的街道是很危险的。

sentence: Children are playing around the ______ in the park.
sentence_translation: 孩子们在公园的喷泉周围玩耍。

sentence: Can you ______ me ______ at the library on your way to work?
sentence_translation: 你上班路上能让我在图书馆下车吗？

sentence: The ______ was built to remember the soldiers who died in the war.
sentence_translation: 这座纪念碑是为了纪念在战争中牺牲的士兵而建的。

sentence: He forgot to ______ ______ ______ ______ and got a late fee.
sentence_translation: 他忘了交交通罚单，产生了滞纳金。

sentence: The ancient ______ is now open to the public as a museum.
sentence_translation: 这座古老的宫殿现在作为博物馆向公众开放。

sentence: She ______ me ______ ______ to the station when my car broke down.
sentence_translation: 我的车坏了的时候，她让我搭便车去车站。

sentence: A large crowd gathered in the ______ to watch the parade.
sentence_translation: 一大群人聚集在广场上观看游行。

sentence: I’ll ______ ______ my little sister from school at 4 p.m.
sentence_translation: 我下午4点去学校接我妹妹。

sentence: There is a ______ of the famous scientist in front of the university.
sentence_translation: 大学门前有一座这位著名科学家的雕像。

sentence: I need to ______ ______ ______ after work—buy milk and mail a package.
sentence_translation: 我下班后需要办些杂事——买牛奶和寄包裹。

sentence: She spent the morning doing the ______ and folding clothes.
sentence_translation: 她花了一上午洗衣服和叠衣服。
